name: Gemcrafter: Puzzle Journey
description:
Sticks and stones may break your bones, but they may help you find a treasure!
Featuring all-new puzzle gameplay: move gems around the game field to match three and craft new. Use magic amulets to solve puzzle and build your unique puzzle solving strategy.
Join Jim Kraftwerk on his journey and get ready for some three-of-a-kind matching, precious stones crafting, puzzle solving and treasure hunting action. Do you have what it takes to become a true Gemcrafter?
Gemcrafter is fresh, great looking and totally addictive, so what are you waiting for? Featuring dozens of mind-blowing puzzle levels in 10 unique locations: whether you are climbing snowy peaks with a yeti or roaming jungle with a cute amazonian princess, the game will keep you busy for hours.
Invite your friends to see how’s got better gem crafting skills or help each other advance through the game and solve puzzles.
FEATURES:
ALL-NEW PUZZLE GAMEPLAY: Move gems around the game field to match 3 of a kind and craft new variations for later use.
DOZENS OF LEVELS TO PLAY: Play 250 mind-blowing levels in nine unique locations, meet game characters that will guide you on your treasure hunting journey.
COLLECT RARE GEMS: Open hidden treasure chests as you play and find collectable gems. Do you have what it takes to collect them all?
PLAY WITH FRIENDS: Invite your friends to the game to challenge them or help each other solve puzzles!
This game features in-app purchases for better gameplay experience, but you can disable this option in you device settings.
